headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: identity_type
parameters.description: Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . See Identities for details.

parameters.name: identity_id
parameters.description: Identity ID. To get the identities within an ad account, use /identity/get/ .

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: item_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either item_id or item_ids must be specified. If you want to retrieve the information for a single TikTok post, pass item_id . If you want to retrieve the information for multiple TikTok posts, pass item_ids . The TikTok post ID that is associated with the provided Identity ID ( identity_id ). To get the TikTok posts associated with an identity, use /identity/video/get/ and extract the TikTok post ID ( item_id ) from the response.

parameters.name: item_ids Conditional
parameters.description: Either item_id or item_ids must be specified. If you want to retrieve the information for a single TikTok post, pass item_id . If you want to retrieve the information for multiple TikTok posts, pass item_ids . A list of TikTok post IDs that are associated with the provided Identity ID ( identity_id ). Max size: 20. To get the TikTok posts associated with an identity, use /identity/video/get/ and extract the TikTok post ID ( item_id ) from the response.

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: The type of TikTok posts that you want to retrieve. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post. Default value: VIDEO .

examples.title: Get info about one TikTok post associated with a TT_USER identity
Get info about one TikTok post associated with a AUTH_CODE identity
Get info about multiple TikTok posts associated with a BC_AUTH_TT identity

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: video_detail
fields.description: Returned when item_id is passed in the request. Information about the TikTok post.

fields.name: item_type
fields.description: The type of TikTok post. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: TikTok post ID.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Visibility status of the TikTok post. Enum values: ITEM_STATUS_HESITATE_RECOMMEND : visible to all. STATUS_ONLY_FRIEND_SEE : visible to friends. ITEM_STATUS_ONLY_AUTHOR_SEE : private.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Text for the TikTok post.

fields.name: anchor_list
fields.description: Anchor information.

fields.name: anchor_id
fields.description: Anchor ID.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Anchor title.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Anchor status. Enum values: CHECKING , CHECK_FAILED , CHECK_SUCCESS .

fields.name: url
fields.description: Anchor URL.

fields.name: product_regions
fields.description: Countries and regions that the ad can be delivered to. This is a list of country or region codes. For example, ["DE"] .

fields.name: auth_info
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is set to AUTH_CODE in the request. Authorization status.

fields.name: ad_auth_status
fields.description: The authorization status.

fields.name: auth_start_time
fields.description: Time when the authorization code is valid from (UTC+0), in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" .

fields.name: auth_end_time
fields.description: Time when the authorization code expires (UTC+0), in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" .

fields.name: invite_start_time_stamp
fields.description: The time when the authorization starts (UTC+0), in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" .

fields.name: video_info
fields.description: Information about the video post. Note : When item_type is CAROUSEL , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: bit_rate
fields.description: Bit rates, in bps.

fields.name: duration
fields.description: The duration of the video, in seconds.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size of the video, in bytes.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the video.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the video.

fields.name: poster_url
fields.description: The URL to the video poster. Validity period: an hour. When it expires, you need to get a new URL.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: The MD5 for the video file.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Video preview link. Validity period: an hour. When it expires, you need to call the endpoint again to get a new URL.

fields.name: carousel_info
fields.description: Information about the photo post. Note : When item_type is VIDEO , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: image_info
fields.description: Information about the images used in the photo post. The images are returned in the same order as they are shown in the photo post.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: Image ID.

fields.name: image_url
fields.description: The URL of the image. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: image_height
fields.description: The height of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: image_width
fields.description: The width of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: music_info
fields.description: Information about the music used in the photo post. Note : If the photo post is directly published in the TikTok App without music, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: Music ID.

fields.name: music_url
fields.description: The URL of the music. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: music_duration
fields.description: The duration of the music, in seconds.

fields.name: video_details
fields.description: Returned when item_ids is passed in the request. Information about the TikTok posts.

fields.name: item_type
fields.description: The type of TikTok post. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: TikTok post ID.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Visibility status of the TikTok post. Enum values: ITEM_STATUS_HESITATE_RECOMMEND : visible to all. ITEM_STATUS_ONLY_AUTHOR_SEE : visible to friends. STATUS_ONLY_FRIEND_SEE : private.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Text for the TikTok post.
